dependency-type: direct:development ... Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] ") | Oct 13, 2024 | | [rollup.config.js](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/rollup.config.js "rollup.config.js") | [rollup.config.js](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/rollup.config.js "rollup.config.js") | [feat: add es5 build output](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/commit/5eb243b9ab9fee71e60dbecc0a4fefafdef7ad4f "feat: add es5 build output fixes #60") | Feb 5, 2021 | | [tsconfig.json](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/tsconfig.json "tsconfig.json") | [tsconfig.json](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/tsconfig.json "tsconfig.json") | [fix: enable ivy for Angular](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/commit/a12b02a11fd4285004383c1ca7cba68a3bb84ac4 "fix: enable ivy for Angular") | Nov 9, 2020 | | View all files | ## Repository files navigation # The Google Pay button [Permalink: The Google Pay button](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button#the-google-pay-button) The [Google Pay API](https://developers.google.com/pay/api/web/overview) enables fast, simple checkout on your website. This provides convenient access to hundreds of millions of cards that are saved to Google Accounts worldwide. See Google Pay in action: [![Buy with Google Pay](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/raw/main/docs/images/google-pay-button.svg)](https://developers.google.com/pay/api/web/guides/resources/demos) This repository contains Google Pay button implementations for compatible with popular website frameworks even easier. ## Web [Permalink: Web](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button#web) This is a bare bones, plain vanilla JavaScript implementation of the Google Pay button. These examples are designed to launch into a Project IDX Workspace, ready to run. - [Example code basic](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/examples/html/gpay-web-101) [![Open in IDX](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/1eddbc04159a0c6b3e0b69ceea40f9370769717f92872df13a7df9d04854c2a4/68747470733a2f2f63646e2e6964782e6465762f62746e2f6f70656e5f707572706c655f33322e737667)](https://goo.gle/4fnRl4N) - [Example code advanced](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/examples/html/gpay-web-201) [![Open in IDX](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/1eddbc04159a0c6b3e0b69ceea40f9370769717f92872df13a7df9d04854c2a4/68747470733a2f2f63646e2e6964782e6465762f62746e2f6f70656e5f707572706c655f33322e737667)](https://goo.gle/3YPHFce) ## Web component [Permalink: Web component](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button#web-component) [![npm version](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/96c97805c1c3a3ce3dfae5617e145844a7187843453533ce7ad0e14493f1f2d9/68747470733a2f2f62616467652e667572792e696f2f6a732f253430676f6f676c652d706179253246627574746f6e2d656c656d656e742e737667)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@google-pay/button-element) The [Google Pay web component button](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/src/button-element) makes it easy to integrate Google Pay into your website using standards based custom elements. Web components can be used directly in a standard HTML web application as is, and is also [compatible with many popular web frameworks](https://custom-elements-everywhere.com/). - [Example Vue Google Pay button](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/examples/vue) - [Example Svelte Google Pay button](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/examples/svelte) ``` npm install @google-pay/button-element ``` Find out more about the [Google Pay web component button](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/src/button-element). ## React [Permalink: React](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button#react) [![npm version](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/eba11a3b25a53a3eea7a8a77c17eead8b68b269d0448a100f3ee561037414a89/68747470733a2f2f62616467652e667572792e696f2f6a732f253430676f6f676c652d706179253246627574746f6e2d72656163742e737667)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@google-pay/button-react) Web components are more difficult to consume in a React application due to the extra work involved in binding to web component properties with React. A separate [Google Pay React button](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/src/button-react) has been created to make it easy to integrate Google Pay into your React website. ``` npm install @google-pay/button-react ``` Find out more about the [Google Pay React button](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/src/button-react). ## Angular [Permalink: Angular](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button#angular) [![npm version](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c230e7633fd96bb7f429d52a54a8b5f18150a1e3a048bf4860ea02d07add4965/68747470733a2f2f62616467652e667572792e696f2f6a732f253430676f6f676c652d706179253246627574746f6e2d616e67756c61722e737667)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@google-pay/button-angular) An Angular version of the [Google Pay button](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/src/button-angular) has been created to make it easier to integrate Google Pay into your Angular website. The advantage of using the Angular version of the Google Pay button over the web component is that it eliminates the need to register `CUSTOM_ELEMENTS_SCHEMA`. ``` npm install @google-pay/button-angular ``` Find out more about the [Google Pay Angular button](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/blob/main/src/button-angular). ## Other frameworks [Permalink: Other frameworks](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button#other-frameworks) The intention is for the web component to support other web frameworks. Support for additional framework specific libraries will be considered based on demand. ## Have any questions? [Permalink: Have any questions?](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button#have-any-questions) Ask it on the [discussions](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/discussions) section of the Google Pay button project. ## About Google Pay button - React, Angular, and custom element ### Topics [react](https://github.com/topics/react "Topic: react") [angular](https://github.com/topics/angular "Topic: angular") [typescript](https://github.com/topics/typescript "Topic: typescript") [custom-element](https://github.com/topics/custom-element "Topic: custom-element") [google-pay](https://github.com/topics/google-pay "Topic: google-pay") ### Resources [Readme](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button#readme-ov-file) ### License [Apache-2.0 license](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button#Apache-2.0-1-ov-file) ### Code of conduct [Code of conduct](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button#coc-ov-file) ### Security policy [Security policy](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button#security-ov-file) [Activity](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/activity) [Custom properties](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/custom-properties) ### Stars [**271**\\ stars](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/stargazers) ### Watchers [**15**\\ watching](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/watchers) ### Forks [**74**\\ forks](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/forks) [Report repository](https://github.com/contact/report-content?content_url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fgoogle-pay%2Fgoogle-pay-button&report=google-pay+%28user%29) ## [Releases\ 68](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/releases) [v3.1.0\\ Latest\\ \\ Mar 28, 2024](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/releases/tag/v3.1.0) [\+ 67 releases](https://github.com/google-pay/google-pay-button/releases) ## [Packages\ 3](https://github.com/orgs/google-pay/packages?repo_name=google-pay-button) -
